front.title: Examples of the 'XML2RFC' Version 2 and 3 Vocabularies

abstract.t: This document gives examples of use of the "XML2RFC" vocabulary. The examples cover both version 2 and version 3. The purposes of this draft is to give developers of tools that process v2 and/or v3 documents a corpus to test against.

section.title: Introduction
section.t: This document gives examples of use of the "XML2RFC" vocabulary. The examples cover both version 2 and version 3 . The purpose of this document is to help developers of tools that process v2 and/or v3 documents to see examples of the documents.

Earlier versions of this document said that it was to help people with v2 documents transition to v3. The authors have backed off from that goal. Instead, we point out that the changes from v2 to v3 are listed in detail in Section 1.2 of . Also, we expect that there will be additional documents created later describing the v2-to-v3 conversion, as well as tools that will do as much of the conversion as possible.
This is meant to be a short-lived document. It is not expected that this document will be published as an RFC.
